description: A notification when a diameter connection is disconnected
via a disconnect request.

event.Summary: Diameter connection terminated via disconnect request

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APDD-MIB::apDdConnectionFailureTrap APDD-MIB::apDdInterfaceRealmName s EXAMPLE APDD-MIB::apDdDiameterAgentHostName s EXAMPLE APDD-MIB::apDdDiameterIPPort s EXAMPLE APDD-MIB::apDdDiameterAgentOriginHostName s EXAMPLE APDD-MIB::apDdDiameterAgentOriginRealmName s EXAMPLE APDD-MIB::apDdTransportType i 1 APDD-MIB::apDdInterfaceStatusReason i 0

description: Realm name of the DD interface if the row is for per interface
stats. Otherwise, it is an empty string.
variables.name: APDD-MIB::apDdInterfaceRealmName

description: The hostname of the Diameter Agent where it is hosted.
variables.name: APDD-MIB::apDdDiameterAgentHostName

description: The IP port of the Diameter Agent where it is hosted.
variables.name: APDD-MIB::apDdDiameterIPPort

description: The origin hostname of the Diameter Agent where it is hosted.
variables.name: APDD-MIB::apDdDiameterAgentOriginHostName

description: The origin realm name of the Diameter Agent where it is hosted.
variables.name: APDD-MIB::apDdDiameterAgentOriginRealmName

description: The transport type of the DD interface.
variables.name: APDD-MIB::apDdTransportType

description: The reason for the status change on a DD interface
variables.name: APDD-MIB::apDdInterfaceStatusReason

description: A notification when a transport failure has been recovered.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APDD-MIB::apDdConnectionFailureClearTrap APDD-MIB::apDdInterfaceRealmName s EXAMPLE APDD-MIB::apDdDiameterAgentHostName s EXAMPLE APDD-MIB::apDdDiameterIPPort s EXAMPLE APDD-MIB::apDdDiameterAgentOriginHostName s EXAMPLE APDD-MIB::apDdDiameterAgentOriginRealmName s EXAMPLE APDD-MIB::apDdTransportType i 1 APDD-MIB::apDdInterfaceStatusReason i 0

description: A notification when a SCTP path fails.
